title: Cheating Justice: How Bush and Cheney Attacked the Rule of Law a
description:
Publisher: Beacon Press (February 7, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0807003212
ISBN-13: 978-0807003213

Holtzman and Cooper reveal how the Bush-Cheney administration broke the lawÃ¢â‚¬â€and why and how the people can bring them to justice.

Deceiving Congress about the war in Iraq, illegal wire-tapping, and torture are only a few of the ways that the Bush-Cheney administration transgressed the law. Yet, they remain unindicted for these and other offenses. This book details how they got away with it, and how we can hold them accountable.
